<!-- ABOUT THE PROJECT -->
## About The Project
Plug and play webcomponents for making a webapp. 


![Product Name Screen Shot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KORTxyz/ogcapi-components/master/.readme/screenshot.jpg)
